mapper.select: SELECT a.popup_image_path, b.popup_name FROM popcon.popup AS b JOIN popcon.popup_image AS a ON b.popup_id = a.popup_id WHERE b.popup_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT pc.popup_id FROM popcon.popup_category pc JOIN ( SELECT popcon.popup_category.category_Name FROM popcon.popup_category JOIN popcon.popup_recommend ON popcon.popup_category.popup_id = popcon.popup_recommend.popup_id WHERE popcon.popup_recommend.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY popcon.popup_category.category_Name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3 ) AS top_categories ON pc.category_Name = top_categories.category_Name WHERE pc.popup_id NOT IN ( SELECT popup_id FROM popcon.popup_recommend WHERE popcon.popup_recommend.user_id = #{user_id} ) ) group by popup_name limit 10;
